name: Patolli (itch) (pouagames)
description:
Inspired by the Mesoamerican worldview, based on the oldest and most popular game of chance in America: El Patolli.

The gods have begun to play, each one will invite us to their home where through various scenarios we will be able to play and offer worship to the gods Macuilxochitl and Ometochtli. Dare to try your luck! be careful not to land in jail or turn into a pig
